column4: The synaptic package manager underwent major changes between 9.04 and 9.10 and the need "Software Center" does not work right so the only stable version for adding software via synaptic package manager is version 9.04
Correction: " between 9.04 and 9.10 and the need "Software Center" " => " between 9.04 and 9.10 and the new "Software Center" "
